document.full_text: the san francisco board of supervisors approved a tax holiday that could save zynga, yelp and other internet companies that are headquartered in the city millions of dollars.
document.title: san francisco tech companies get a tax break
lines_and_colors: the san francisco board of supervisors approved a tax holiday that could save zynga, yelp and other internet companies that are headquartered in the city millions of dollars.
